email.subject: Operation Blackout
email.body:
Hey #PLAYERNAME#! As part of our critical mission to dismantle a dangerous network involved in criminal activities, we need to take immediate and comprehensive action to eliminate all traces of this network. Additionally, I need you to upload a pdf file called "ADDRESS_BLACKOUT.pdf" that is located somewhere on that network, it contains the address of the main server of the network. This should be a simple task for you.
Best regards, Codex Connect Hub Services
